name: 2025 6th International Conference on Supply Chain Management
content: Publication: After a careful reviewing process, all accepted papers after proper registration and presentation, and all the accepted papers of ICSCM will be published in Journal of Advanced Management Science (JOAMS) (DOI: 10.18178/joams), and indexed by Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Google Scholar, Crossref, Engineering & Technology Digital Library and Electronic Journals Digital Library.
organizers: SAISE, Hosei University, Japan and Fukushima University, Japan
